description: Manage IP addresses on an interface on Solaris/illumos systems

addrtype.description: Specifiies a type of IP address to configure.

temporary.description: Specifies that the configured IP address is temporary. Temporary IP addresses do not persist across reboots.

state.description: Create/delete/enable/disable an IP address on the network interface.

address.description: Specifiies an IP address to configure in CIDR notation.

wait.description: Specifies the time in seconds we wait for obtaining address via DHCP.

addrobj.description: Specifies an unique IP address on the system.
